settings.text:
With Inkseekers, you can create and sell various apparel items such as short sleeve t-shirts, long sleeve t-shirts, crewneck sweatshirts & hoodies for your brand.


Your garments are printed using on demand printing techniques such as direct to garment printing (DTG) & Digital Transfers.

Most of the items are printed using latest in DTG technology to give you vibrant looking prints that will last for years. Digital transfers are used to decorate fabrics such as poly cotton blends, 100% polyester.


Please visit links to our social media below to see our DTG printing process.

If your brand sells drinkware, or looking into it, then laser engraved drinkware might be a good option. Inkseekers offers premium powder coated drinkware such as tumblers, water bottles, wine tumblers etc.

These have very good insulation, which keeps the contents color for up to 12 hours, and hot for up to 4 hours.

Inkseekers relies on just in time production method to handle print on demand orders. Biggest benefit of on demand printing is, as a seller you are not holding any inventory. Each item is produced after an order is made and shipped directly to your customer.

Please refer to FAQ section to go over common questions regarding print on demand, shipping etc.
